name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.
name.caption: Name
name.name: name

enum.description: Action to take when no token is found.
enum.caption: On No Token
enum.name: onNoToken

string.name: consumerSecret

string.caption: Scope
string.name: scope

globalRef.description: Specify which configuration to use for this invocation.
globalRef.caption: Config Reference
globalRef.name: config-ref

cloud-connector.description: Google Tasks Cloud connector. This connector covers almost all the Google Tasks API v3 using OAuth2 for authentication.
cloud-connector.caption: Google Tasks

string.caption: Access Token Id
string.name: accessTokenId

string.description: Upper bound for a task's completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by.
string.caption: Completed Max
string.name: completedMax

string.description: Lower bound for a task's completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by.
string.caption: Completed Min
string.name: completedMin

string.description: Upper bound for a task's due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by.
string.caption: Due Max
string.name: dueMax

string.description: Lower bound for a task's due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by.
string.caption: Due Min
string.name: dueMin

string.description: Task list identifier.
string.caption: Task List Id
string.name: taskListId

string.description: Lower bound for a task's last modification time (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by.
string.caption: Updated Min
string.name: updatedMin

boolean.description: Flag indicating whether deleted tasks are returned in the result.
boolean.caption: Show Deleted
boolean.name: showDeleted

boolean.description: Flag indicating whether hidden tasks are returned in the result.
boolean.caption: Show Hidden
boolean.name: showHidden

boolean.description: Flag indicating whether completed tasks are returned in the result.
boolean.caption: Showcompleted
boolean.name: showcompleted
